spec_data.Name: cmirror-standalone
spec_data.Description:
Additional files needed to run daemon for device-mapper-based clustered
mirrors in standalone mode as a service without cluster resource manager
involvement (e.g. pacemaker).
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 04 Aug 2017 03:48:23 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Additional files to support device-mapper-based clustered mirrors in standalone mode
